titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7693

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, Septr 8th 1862
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State
Sir
I have issued, and delivered the following Commissions viz:

all dated 10 August 1862.
C. M. Whip Capt:.
R. B. Wilkinson 2 Lieut --
Danl. Parker Capt:
Kannet D. Rowe 2 Lieut --
Jno. Dever Capt: --
Wm Penn 2 Lieut --
J. B. Carson Capt: --
E. A. Coppage 2 Lieut: --
John E. Sharp 1 Lieut:
D. W. Coleman 2 Lieut:
M. Kennett 1 Lieut:
Jno. Brown 2 Lieut:
G. F. Cunningham 1 Lieut:
Jno. D. Belden 2 Lieut:
Wm Combas 1 Lieut:
Wm Smith 2 Lieut.
The Commission of D. C. Stone Captain & Theodore S. Thommasson 1 Lieut: both of which are dated, January 22. 1862, are to rank from the 10th day of July 1861. date of their election --
Commissioned Samuel M. Starling 2d. Lieut: & delivered -- date Septr: 8, 1862

Com: issd. & deld. to Alexander K. Johnston & dated Sep: 8, 1862 -- 2d Lieutenant --
Do to W. S. Ross Surgeon -- date Aug 29, 1862
Do to L. H. Rousseau Lt. Colo date Aug 11. 1862 --
Do to Danl. T. Barret 2d. Lieut date Sep. 9. 1862 --
Do to Isaac Everitt Jr. 2d. Lieut date Sep. 9. 1862 --

Capt: L. H. Rousseau pro: date of Com. Nov 5, 1861 --
Lieut: Ed. Hughes -- dead -- " " " Feb 12, 1862
Capt: John G. Eve -- this Commission has been Cancelled -- date of same Aug. 29. 1862 -- (It would be best not to entered this & if entered to mark it out -- we have done so -- )

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Ad. Gen. Ky. Vols:
